plot: Ah Ngor, a maid servant, is made pregnant by her master Chan Ying-kit. She has no choice but to entrust her son Tin-sun to the care of the head of hospital...
title: Ku hai ming deng
plot_es: Ah Ngor, a maid servant, is made pregnant by her master Chan Ying-kit. She has no choice but to entrust her son Tin-sun to the care of the head of hospital...
plot_en: Ah Ngor, a maid servant, is made pregnant by her master Chan Ying-kit. She has no choice but to entrust her son Tin-sun to the care of the head of hospital...
